coverage_details.inpatient_outpatient_treatment: Both, including companion charges (one companion, any age), prescribed medications and vitamins for deficiencies.
coverage_details.checkup: Annual checkup included under dental and pre-employment, Iqama renewal medicals covered.
coverage_details.vaccination: Seasonal, non-MOH, and MOH schedule (up to 6 years) covered. Prescribed vaccinations/injections, preventive meningitis (1x/contract for employees/families in Jeddah, Makkah, Madinah), RSV for children.
coverage_details.optical_frame: Frame limit up to optical limit.
coverage_details.obesity_surgery_bmi_over_35: See BMI>40 field. Sleeve Gastrectomy if BMI>40, up to SR 20,000 per coverage period, deductible 15% up to SR 1,000. May apply if BMI>35 with complications per eligibility criteria.
coverage_details.obesity_surgery_bmi_over_40: Sleeve Gastrectomy if BMI>40, up to SR 20,000 per coverage period, deductible 15% up to SR 1,000. May apply if BMI>35 with complications per eligibility criteria.
coverage_details.organ_transplant: Organ transplantation incl. donor costs & organ cost, fresh/synthetic/marrow/artificial; incl. cochlear and kidney transplants.
coverage_details.neonatal_screening: Covered - Up to Annual Limit, includes early hearing and critical congenital heart disease programs for all newborns.
coverage_details.psychiatric: Autism coverage explicitly stated. Covered up to SR 50,000; no explicit further psychiatric note found.
coverage_details.hearing_aids_audiometry: Hearing loss and delayed speech covered. SR 6,000.00 limit
coverage_details.dental_general: Dental corrective and emergency: limits are interchangeable. Dental medical treatment fully covered (X-rays, fillings, root canal, extractions incl. wisdom teeth, periodontal, scaling/prophylaxis, annual checkup, risk assessments, one cleaning/scaling per year, fillings, root canal, emergency dental). No sub-limit for surgical treatment. Anterior/Posterior Crowns NOT covered.
coverage_details.dental_corrective: Covered as above. SR 2,400.00 in earlier note for Executive; deductible Nil
coverage_details.dental_emergency: Covered as above. SR 1,600.00 with 0% deductible
coverage_details.neo_natal_care: Covered - Up to Annual Limit, includes circumcision up to 1 year and ear piercing
coverage_details.newborn_disability_screening: Covered - early hearing and critical congenital heart disease programs for all newborns. SR 100,000.00
coverage_details.alzheimers: Covered up to annual max limit.
coverage_details.maternity: Maternity treatment covered, sub-limit SR 20,000 for normal delivery (specific limit not given), post-IVF pregnancy/complications covered. Newborns covered from day 1.
coverage_details.optical: All lens specs, permanent soft/intraocular lenses, daily/monthly/disposable contact lenses covered up to optical limit SR 700.00. Optical medical and surgery (Eye Laser, Retinopathy, Retinal, if MD-recommended): surgical sublimit SR 20,000. Refractive surgeries up to SR 20,000.
coverage_details.autism: Covered up to SR 50,000 (incl. school fees).
coverage_details.ear_piercing: Ear piercing for newborn girls covered up to SR 300.
coverage_details.physiotherapy: Physiotherapy, occupational, developmental therapy, rehab covered when medically required.
coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: Medication limit is equal to pre-authorization approval limit.
coverage_details.special_instructions: Special deductible at Dr. Suliman Al Habib, Dr. Soliman Fakeeh, Dallah, Kingdom, and Al Hammadi Hospitals: 15% up to SAR 150 per member per class.
